name: v1.9.0
body:
New release, same as the old release, only better.
This one is full of bazel!

name: v1.8.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Update authorization examples and use of bootz by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/219


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.8.1...v1.8.2

name: v1.8.1
body:
## What's Changed
* pathz: clarify gSII Modify RPC should also be disconnected on pathz rotation by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/222
* Add TPM2B_CREATION_DATA to the MBM data. by @avanpo in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/221
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.34.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/223


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.8.0...v1.8.1

name: v1.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Clarify the documentation surrounding authorized_key field. by @avanpo in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/212
* Test build - this may get deleted, or include fixes to the github/workflows/bazel.yaml file eventually? by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/216
* Issue152 - this issue's problem was actually already resolved but in reading - some cleanup of text seemed proper. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/215
* Dependabot raised a bug about net/html. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/217
* Add a field for the CSR signature to the MBM data. by @avanpo in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/218


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.7.0...v1.8.0

name: v1.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Clarify multiplexing profile operations is not allowed in Certz.Rotate by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/201
* Update credentialz for glome. by @sourcequench in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/204
* Added support for rsa 3072 and ecdsa 384 by @rohit21187 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/206
* Issue210: Update / Improve comment for 'AccountCredentials'. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/211
* Add API to retrieve the TCG Reference Integrity Manifest data. by @avanpo in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/209
* Add force_override to align with authz/pathz by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/208

## New Contributors
* @rohit21187 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/206
* @avanpo made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/209

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.6...v1.7.0

name: v1.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix typo in `certz.proto`. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/197
* certz: clarify comment for TrustBundle.pkcs7_block field by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/198
* certz: clarify that ssl_profile_id cannot be empty by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/199
* Add a `profile` field to the `authz.Rotate` RPC. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/200


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.5...v1.6

name: v1.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove GNOI version field from GNSI protos. by @bstoll in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/194

## New Contributors
* @bstoll made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/194

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.4.5...v1.5.0

name: v1.4.4
body:

* Fix typos in acctz.proto by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/186

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.4.3...v1.4.4

body:

* Update BUILD.bazel by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/185


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3

name: v1.4.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Standardize grpc compiler setup in repo by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/184


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

name: v1.4.1
body:
## What's Changed
* gnsi/pathz: clarify rotation behaviour for ongoing gNMI subscriptions by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/143
* Provide clarification on the field component_name by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/162
* acctz: update GrpcService payload field by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/169
* certz: clarify usage of entity_type field by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/170
* Add detailed scenarios on when history_istruncated is set to True by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/171
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.30.0 to 1.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/173
* acctz timeout behavior was removed; remove it from the yang model. by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/175
* certz: support specifying cert/key by enum by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/172
* Fix pasto in acctz yang variable description by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/174
* Remove yang OC models by @dplore in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/166
* Trustbundles may be a long string in PKCS#7 encoding. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/179
* Readd field into record response to fix wire versioning with Cisco by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/181
* Default go build rule in pathz by @rlucus in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/177
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.17.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/182
* Fix bazel build update deps by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/183

## New Contributors
* @rlucus made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/177

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

name: v1.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Correct RPC name examples in acctz comments by @earies in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/146
* update bazel version by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/165
* Update readme to use agreed upon profile name and clarify the by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/167
* Add ExistingEntity to allow copying Entities from existing profiles. by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/168


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

name: v1.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update generated files based on 4.6.0 grpc rules by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/161
* Revert stream change to method. by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/163


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.2.5...v1.3.0

name: v1.2.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Added principal and role fields by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/138
* Update docs & comments for the behavior of the RecordSubscribe service, by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/148
* Add name of the component name where the accounting response originated by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/147
* Argument to RecordSubscribe should not be a stream. by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/149
* Update the text with updated behavior and generate the go bindings by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/151
* Update authorization-README.md by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/154
* Update README.md by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/155
* gnsi/certz: rename certz counters by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/156
* Refactor deps in prep for bazel mod by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/158
* gnsi/certz: fix error in yang description by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/159


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.2.4...v1.2.5

name: v1.2.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README for recent changes to services. by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/123
* Provision for clearing SSH authorized keys/principals from configuration by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/129
* Added version/created-on fields for admin-user by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/130
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.7.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/131
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.49.0 to 1.56.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/132
* Change type name CMD_SERVICE_TYPE_HTTP -> _WEBUI by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/133
* separate authentication status and user info.  Make both members of by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/122
* Update authorization and authentication entity names by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/134
* Update telemetry, replacing "users" with "principals where appropriate. by @sourcequench in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/135
* Update comment to indicate that timestamp is nanoseconds since epoch UTC by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/141
* Added a enum SESSION_STATUS_OPERATION by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/142
* README references the wrong yang filename by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/140
* Initial stab at telemetry for accounting by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/139
* clarify release support by @dplore in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/88
* Fix typo in the YANG leaf name by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/144

## New Contributors
* @dplore made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/88

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.2.3...v1.2.4

name: v1.2.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Correct reference to the AccountingPull/Push in README.  From Ryan Shea. by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/108
* Expand documentation for CommandService.cmd & cmd_args when service_t… by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/107
* Add boolean *_istrunctated fields corresponding to by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/106
* Add SessionInfo.local_address and clarify value of system_address and by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/105
* gnsi.accounting.Records are for *all* types of gNxI requests, not just Sets by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/100
* Clean-up some language, omissions, and inconsistencies. by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/101
* Make accounting.SessionInfo.system_address a repeated field that migh… by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/113
* The default authz policy should allow all RPCs by default until a policy by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/104
* "switch" -> "device" by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/110
* Add version and created-on fields for GenerateKeysRequest by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/109
* Refactor accounting service to "acctz" by @earies in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/115
* Explain that config_metadata should be a transactional UUID, allowing… by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/114
* Refactor acctz SessionInfo message by @earies in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/118
* RecordResponse.ServiceStatus only applies to GrpcService (RPCs) by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/117
* Remove ServiceStatus after further discussion with mschleifer.  These… by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/119
* Add comments to clarify the record history on a server. by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/120
* Update acctz README for changes to record history resulting from PR !… by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/124
* certz: add ssl-profile-id leaf by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/126
* Fix the canonical order of "config" statement by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/125
* Fix acctz BUILD and add generated Go code. by @greg-dennis in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/128

## New Contributors
* @earies made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/115
* @greg-dennis made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/128

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

name: v1.2.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Add missing enums to gnsi.accounting by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/94
* Rename RotateHostCredentials to RotateHostParameters, Add AllowedAuthentication setting by @sourcequench in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/90
* Fixed type in ssh-options and generate go files by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/103


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

name: v1.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Regenerates .pb.go files. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/86


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

name: v1.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Adds authentication policy rotation to gNSI.certz API. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/81
* Changes version from 1.0.0 to 1.1.0 by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/84
* typos and misc cleanup from gnmi migration by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/85
* Develop new api for getting public key and address the gaps from Arista by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/80


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v0.2.1...v1.2.0

name: v0.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Improve readme for pathz with examples by @DanG100 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/69
* Update pathz.proto by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/70
* Update README.md by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/71
* Bump golang.org/x/text from 0.3.7 to 0.3.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/72
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.0.0-20210805182204-aaa1db679c0d to 0.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/73
* Issue 68: Start adding Accounting Service details. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/74
* Define version once and bump 1.0.0 by @DanG100 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/75
* Add v1 to proto package by @DanG100 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/76

## New Contributors
* @DanG100 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/69
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/72

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* From github.com/public PR#524. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/1
* Cleanup and add proper OSPO requirements. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/2
* Swap to the proper package path. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/3
* Minor editorial changes to authz README. by @robshakir in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/5
* Adds gNSI.cert definition. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/6
* Adds gNSI.ssh. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/13
* Adds gNSI.console by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/14
* Adds gNSI.authz by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/15
* Adds gNSI.pathz by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/16
* Adds bazel BUILD file to gNSI.authorization by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/17
* Adds the gnsi-telemetry.yang file by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/18
* Pathz improvements by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/19
* Add linter workflow to gnsi repo by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/23
* Make the FinalizeResponse and UploadResponse format the same. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/22
* Change the authorization proto and associated documentation by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/20
* Lint fix, from my attempt at consistency. by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/24
* Initial take on the index.md for cert/ by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/25
* Add super linter badge by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/29
* Removing unbounded collection of pathz policies. Now active + sandbox pathz policies only. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/27
* add docs and move proto into same directory and update build rules by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/30
* Move the authorization.proto and parts under /pathz by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/28
* Fixes wording in description of pathz policy identifier. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/31
* Limits number of authz polices to one per service and adds more info. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/32
* Combines gNSI.ssh with gNSI.console by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/33
* Add generated go files by @mhines01 in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/34
* Adds building of Go library with OpenConfig bindings for gNSI YANG models. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/35
* Accounting by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/4
* Fixes acct.proto and adds BUILD.bazel and generated Go code. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/38
* Replaces gNSI.cert with gNSI.certz by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/39
* Expand comment about CertificateRevocationList->id from comments made by Marcus by @haussli in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/40
* Adds ssh public key type and script to generate .go files by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/47
* Fixes comment re CRS in certz.proto. #41 by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/48
* fix compilation errors and add _grpc.pb.go files by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/37
* adding AuthorizedPrincipalsCommand and fixing bundle references by @sourcequench in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/36
* Fixes field numbering in `UserPolicy`. #49 by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/50
* Added enum's to specify the curve for ECDSA by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/55
* Add provision to specify the crypt hash by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/56
* authz: clarify Rule name field in README by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/54
* Adds support for SSL profiles to certz. Issue #45 by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/51
* Add encryption type and description to CA public key by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/57
* certz: add CSRSuite enums by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/52
* bazel: fix for bazel 6.0.0 by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/60
* Support for generating public/private key on the box by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/59
* certz: enforce certificate ordering by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/62
* certz: add more fields to CSRParams by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/61
* Remove public key and add support for multiple artifacts to be rotated by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/63
* Adds success/failure to authenticate counters. by @tomek-US in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/66
* Adding gnsi.credentialz, hiba-chk API spec file by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/65
* Update all protos to consistent version by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/67

## New Contributors
* @morrowc made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/1
* @robshakir made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/5
* @marcushines made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/23
* @mhines01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/34
* @haussli made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/40
* @brianneville made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/37
* @sourcequench made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/36
* @nmahabaleshwar made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/pull/55

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/gnsi/commits/v0.2.0
